A young girl discovers the tree and becomes obsessed with collecting diamonds.
The tree is guarded by a wise old owl who warns the girl of the dangers of greed.
The girl disregards the owl's advice and continues to collect diamonds, eventually causing the tree to wither and die.
The girl realizes her mistake and is left with nothing but a withered tree and a lifetime of guilt.
The tree's ashes are blown away by the wind, and a new tree sprouts, growing beautiful diamonds once again.
